articles.author: Florence Tan
articles.title: Oil jumps as new US sanctions to curb Russian supply to China, India - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices extended gains for a third session on Monday, with Brent rising above $80 a barrel to its highest in more than four months, as wider U.S. sanctions are expected to affect Russian crude exports to top buyers China and India.

articles.author: Dan Strumpf
articles.title: The World’s Largest Human Gathering Is About to Begin In India - Bloomberg
articles.description: Billed as the world’s largest human gathering, India is hosting a once-in-a-decade religious event from Monday that gives Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party a fresh opportunity to promote its Hindu nationalist agenda among hundreds of millions of pilgrims.
articles.content:
